column4: Latest;Kandal Police arrested a man carrying 690 kg of illegal wildlife in a minivan on August 14
column5: 2019 at 2:30 pm.------Police say they stopped the van 2Z-3490 on Route 110
column12: Kampong Chhnang province was detained.------600kg of live eels and snakes weighing 90kg were seized.------The suspect was handed over to the Koh Thom Fisheries Administration District for further proceedings. ------SOURCE
